title: MotoGear 1.2 for ppc
description:
MotoGear for Pocket pc is simulation software developed by Mobirate.
MotoGear is a bike simulation game like Elastomania.
The goal of the game is to gather all the gears on the level and go to finish flag.

Levels are challenging, so It is not easy to complete them.
Game has online ladder server for records, compete against other people for fastest level time.

Levels from Elastomania are supported. Create levels on DesktopPC and play on your PDA.
Here are some key features of "MotoGear for Pocket PC":
# Real Elastomania physics
# 3 paks with more that 150 levels (more to come)
# Additional level paks
# Support for levels made for Elastomania.
# Create your own levels for game.
# 3 graphics skins for levels (more to come)
# Save and view the replays
# Upload replays to ladder
# Online ladder for BestBikers
# Tournaments with prizes
# Customizable controls for better game feeling
What&#039;s new in this release:
# Minor bugs fixed, stability increased.

Requirements:
# Windows Mobile 2003.
# Windows Mobile 2003 SE.
# Windows Mobile 2005.
MotoGear for Pocket PC 1.4 supports english interface languages and works with Windows Mobile PocketPC.
